snippet: Legislators, under pressure after the release of a grand jury report documenting an extensive cover-up of clergy sexual abuse, took action on Tuesday to give victims more time to seek justice.
abstract: Release of grand jury report revealing extensive cover-up of clergy sexual abuse in Roman Catholic Diocese of Altoona-Johnstown prompts Pennsylvania's House Judiciary Committee to pass bill that would extend state's statute of limitations in child sexual abuse cases.
lead_paragraph: Legislators, under pressure after the release of a grand jury report documenting an extensive cover-up of clergy sexual abuse, took action on Tuesday to give victims more time to seek justice.

headline.main: Pennsylvania: Bill Extending Deadlines in Abuse Cases Advances
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania: Bill Extending Deadlines in Abuse Cases Advances
